id.description: The unique ID of the activity log entry.

event.description: The type of event captured in the activity log.

data.description: Additional data associated with the activity log.

entity.description: The entity that the activity log pertains to.

created_at.description: The timestamp indicating when the activity log was created.

created_at_int.description: The integer representation of the timestamp when the activity log was created.

pulse_id.description: The ID of the pulse associated with this activity log, if applicable.

board_id.description: The ID of the board related to this activity log.
